forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 9pm and 11pm, then a slight chance of rain between 11pm and midnight, then a slight chance of drizzle between midnight and 2am, then a slight chance of rain between 2am and 3am, then a slight chance of drizzle between 3am and 4am, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of cloudiness lingers, offering a gentle embrace to the city. With the temperature hovering just above fifty, a soft southwest breeze dances through the streets, infusing the air with a cool, crisp touch. The scene, though shrouded in overcast, provides a muted but cozy backdrop—ideal for those who find solace in the subdued beauty of a foggy day.

As twilight approaches, the forecast hints at a slight chance of drizzle and perhaps the occasional light rain as the night deepens. With a low settling around fifty-four, the clouds will maintain their presence, veiling the stars in their soft, gray curtain. This calls for layers, perhaps a light sweater or jacket, and an umbrella stashed nearby—essential companions for a leisurely stroll or a casual coffee run through the quaint streets adorned with holiday lights. Seek refuge in a cozy café, delve into a book, or take a tranquil evening stroll along the waterfront; there is no shortage of simple pleasures on this cool, cloud-drifting day.
